description:
Law`s got a trick up his sleeve that could mean the difference between life and death. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, but can they reach safety before being swallowed by a poisonous cloud!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Launching the Counter Attack! Luffy and Law`s Great Escape!
L’heure de la contre-attaque a sonné. La grande évasion de Law et Luffy !
Контратака начинается! Большой побег Луффи и Ло!
反撃開始! ルフィ・ロー大脱出
